dfischer.proxysniffer

Class ProxyRecorderContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.proxysniffer.ProxyRecorderContext

  • public class ProxyRecorderContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Context of the proxy recorder - used by recorder plug-ins.
    See Also:
    ProxyRecorderPluginInterface

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxyRecorderContext(ProxyRecorderSettings recorderSettings, int recordState, int recorderSequenceID, java.util.Vector<ProxyDataRecord> recordVector, ProxySnifferVarSourceHandler varSourceHandler, ProxySnifferVarHandler varHandler, ProxySnifferTransactionHandler transactionHandler, LoadtestExternalResources externalResources, boolean writeDebugInfo)
      Create a new instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProxyRecorderContext

        public ProxyRecorderContext(ProxyRecorderSettings recorderSettings,
                    int recordState,
                    int recorderSequenceID,
                    java.util.Vector<ProxyDataRecord> recordVector,
                    ProxySnifferVarSourceHandler varSourceHandler,
                    ProxySnifferVarHandler varHandler,
                    ProxySnifferTransactionHandler transactionHandler,
                    LoadtestExternalResources externalResources,
                    boolean writeDebugInfo)
        Create a new instance.
        Parameters:
        recorderSettings - configuration data of the proxy recorder
        recordState - the current recorder state (RECORD_STATE_STOPPED or RECORD_STATE_STARTED)
        recorderSequenceID - the current recorder sequence ID (increased each time when reset/clear recording is called). Note that the sequence ID is reset when the recorder process is restarted.
        recordVector - the recorded session
        varSourceHandler - the handler of source definitions for extracting values into variables
        varHandler - the handler for all variables
        transactionHandler - the handler of all declared transactions
        externalResources - the handler for external resources
        writeDebugInfo - if true the recorder plug-in shall write debug information to stdout - recommended stdout methods: dfischer.proxysniffer.Stdout.log(..)
        See Also:
        ProxySniffer.RECORD_STATE_STOPPED, ProxySniffer.RECORD_STATE_STARTED, Stdout

        public int getRecorderSequenceID()
        Get the current recorder sequence ID (increased each time when reset/clear recording is called). Note that the sequence ID is reset when the recorder process is restarted.
        Returns:
        the current recorder sequence ID
        Since:
        V5.2-U
        See Also:
        PrxControl.clearRecording()

      • isWriteDebugInfo

        public boolean isWriteDebugInfo()
        Get if debug information of the recorder plug-in shall be written to stdout. Recommended stdout methods: dfischer.proxysniffer.Stdout.log(..)
        Returns:
        true = the recorder plug-in shall write debug information to stdout, false = don't write any debug information in recorder plug-in
        See Also:
        Stdout
